
# PencePay 
![pencepay](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/pencepay/logo.png?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `pencepay` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] PencePay 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  PencePay provides online payment solutions for merchants in many different industries. We are focused primarily on the Emerging Markets but we also accept merchants from highly developed markets of European Union.  During the course of more than 7 years in e-payments business, we have created a set of technical and usability features unparalleled by other service providers as well as special business relationships with large industry players that allow us to distinguish ourselves on the market in a positive way.
